thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com
thread.title: Stephanie McKenzie

author: Stephanie McKenzie
title: Stephanie McKenzie
text:
We have done business with WTS and Larry Russell for over 20 years. Larry has been the kindest, most helpful gentleman through all of our many ministry projects.
He has helped Trinity Baptist Church and Ralph Sexton Ministries with CD’s, DVD’s, covers and digipaks.
He has never complained when we called with an “emergency deadline” we had to meet.
He has been very helpful in getting the right products for the best price.
We wouldn't want to do business with anyone else, as we have been “spoiled” by having the best rep ever!
